Variable Documentation

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_BB = ME_GRAPH_GLB + 1

Domain operation has changed both greatest lower and least upper bound.

Note that this implies that the domain has not resulted in a value and that also the cardinality has not changed.

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_FAILED = ME_GEN_FAILED

Domain operation has resulted in failure.

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_GLB = ME_GRAPH_LUB + 1

Domain operation has changed the greatest lower bound.

Note that this implies that the domain has not resulted in a value and that also neither cardinality nor the least upper bound have changed.

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_LUB = ME_GRAPH_VAL + 1

Domain operation has changed the least upper bound.

Note that this implies that the domain has not resulted in a value and that also neither cardinality nor the greatest lower bound have changed.

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_NONE = ME_GEN_NONE

Domain operation has not changed domain.

const ModEvent Gecode::Graph::ME_GRAPH_VAL = ME_GEN_ASSIGNED

Domain operation has resulted in a value (assigned variable).

const PropCond Gecode::Graph::PC_GRAPH_ANY = PC_GRAPH_LUB + 1

Propagate when any bound of a view changes.

If a propagator p depends on a view x with propagation condition PC_GRAPH_ANY, then p is propagated when a domain update operation on x returns any modification event but ME_GRAPH_FAILED and ME_GRAPH_NONE.

const PropCond Gecode::Graph::PC_GRAPH_GLB = PC_GRAPH_VAL + 1

Propagate when the greatest lower bound of a view changes.

If a propagator p depends on a view x with propagation condition PC_GRAPH_GLB, then p is propagated when a domain update operation on x returns the modification event ME_GRAPH_VAL or ME_GRAPH_GLB.

const PropCond Gecode::Graph::PC_GRAPH_LUB = PC_GRAPH_GLB + 1

Propagate when the least upper bound of a view changes.

If a propagator p depends on a view x with propagation condition PC_GRAPH_LUB, then p is propagated when a domain update operation on x returns the modification event ME_GRAPH_VAL or ME_GRAPH_LUB.

const PropCond Gecode::Graph::PC_GRAPH_VAL = PC_GEN_ASSIGNED

Propagate when a view becomes assigned (single value).

If a propagator p depends on a view x with propagation condition PC_GRAPH_VAL, then p is propagated when a domain update operation on x returns the modification event ME_GRAPH_VAL.
